title: Game-Changing Physics
description:
How do you change the game? Neil deGrasse Tyson, co-hosts Gary O’Reilly and Chuck Nice, and astrophysicist Charles Liu investigate game-changing techniques used to re-shape sports in the first episode of our mini-series.

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/show/game-changing-physics/

Photo Credit: Fernando Frazão/Agência Brasil, CC BY 2.0, via Wikimedia Commons.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
